description: This beef and black bean stir fry is quicker, easier and healthier than reaching for the takeaway menu.
name: Beef & Black Bean Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g sirloin steak, trimmed and thinly sliced
2 large capsicums, red and green, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the sliced steak in cornflour and heat the oil in a large wok over a high heat. Add the steak strips and cook for 3 minutes until browned. Remove from the wok with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the onion, capsicums and broccoli to the pan and cook for 5-6 minutes until softened, then add the garlic, ginger and red chilli and cook for 2 minutes.
Place the steak strips back in the pan and pour over the black bean sauce, vinegar and honey. Loosen with a tablespoon of water and simmer for 1 minute.
Serve immediately with rice or noodles.
